equipped.name: (a velvet cloak, lined in wolf fur)

carrying.name: (a Book: The Lost Library of Shiran)

mobs.long_desc: A young man dressed in heavy fur cloaks trudges through the snow.
mobs.desc: This young man is a trapper by trade who is forced to endure such harsh conditions to scrape out a meager existence.  He grumbles something about the blasted weather and his cruel boss and begs you let him continue with his work.

mobs.long_desc: A huge man in thick fur robes watches you like a predator watches prey.
mobs.desc: This guy is huge, and you can see why the other trappers defer to him as their leader.  His face is scarred presumably from many battles with animals that were not willing to give up their fur.

mobs.long_desc: A huge humanoid, over 15' tall, raises his arms in a mighty war cry.
mobs.desc: The huge humanoid before you is a Frost Giant, a rare breed of giants that inhabit only the coldest of regions.  He has the appearance of a viking with a long yellow beard and flowing blond hair.  You notice his skin is an ivory color and you wonder if ice flows through his veins instead of warm human blood.

mobs.long_desc: A giant with pale skin and braided hair raises a mighty woop as if to attack.
mobs.desc: This giant appears to be a chieftain among the clan of Frost Giants.  He is slightly taller than the others and his clothing is more decorative and of higher quality.  He glares down at you with pale blue eyes.

mobs.long_desc: A huge, pale blue toad watches you out of the corner of its large eyes.
mobs.desc: This huge toad is over 8 feet long.  Its skin is a pale blue color and darker blue splotches cover its body.  Coldness seems to radiate from this creature and you can hear it making low guttural noises.  You have heard that these creatures can swallow a man whole.

mobs.long_desc: A bloated humanoid covered in warts crouches in the snow.
mobs.desc: Ice Toad Lords are a strange mix of toad and human, probably the result of some failed magical experiment.  They are bloated and fat, and their entire body is covered in huge sickly warts.  A wave of nausea overcomes you just looking at this disgusting creature.

mobs.long_desc: A giant lynx, perched in the snow, watches you carefully.
mobs.desc: It is unknown why species found in the arctic regions tend to be larger than those found elsewhere.  However, the giant lynx does nothing to disprove this. It is well over 5 feet long and is fast and powerful.

mobs.long_desc: A huge eight-legged insectoid with a hard shell and pincers moves towards you.
mobs.desc: This creature has a hard, chitinous shell of overlapping plates and eight legs. It looks like a cross between a spider and a lobster.  Its six back legs are used for travel while the front two are equipped with powerful pincers which are used to dismember prey.  And at the moment it appears to think you are the prey.

mobs.long_desc: A winged, feathered serpent, apparently made of ice, circles above you.
mobs.desc: This giant snake has feathered wings midway down its body.  Feathers cover its body and tip of its tail is like that of a bird.  However, its feathers appear made of ice; they are partially transparent and light blue in color. You have heard about these creatures in legend but doubted their existence until now.  They are known as Ice Couatls.

mobs.long_desc: A giant human with slight deformities looks at you with uneven eyes.
mobs.desc: Known commonly as "human behemoths" these giant humans are a race of minor giants known as Verbeegs.  There are characterized by unusual height, for a human, and slight deformities which range from uneven eyes to club feet.  These deformities, and the race of Verbeegs in general, are rumored to be the result of a failed experiment to create a race of "greater-humans."

mobs.long_desc: A monstrous, wingless white dragon watches you from a distance.
mobs.desc: Upon closer inspection you can notice that this creature is not a dragon at all but rather a race of giant lizards known as Ice Lizards. Their skin is a pale grey, almost white, with a mottled pale blue back and undersides.  Although not as fierce-some as a dragon these creatures can tear a man limb from limb with its powerful claws and bite.

mobs.long_desc: Black tentacles stretch out from a large sphere made of black energy.
mobs.desc: This creature is pure evil made matter.  Long tentacles of dark energy streak out from a large spherical body.  Glowing eyes in the center of this creature seem to stare into your soul.  The whole being crackles with negative energy.

mobs.long_desc: There appears to be a slight disturbance in the air here.
mobs.desc: Something is not right here!  The air before you seems to shimmer slightly. Time seems to slow down and then fly by rapidly.  Images from your childhood flash before your eyes.  You look down at a gravestone and see your name carved into the rock.  The creature before you is made of the very essence of time itself...

mobs.long_desc: A huge disturbance seems to force its way through the air.
mobs.desc: Something is not right here!  The air before you seems to shimmer slightly. Time seems to slow down and then fly by rapidly.  Images from your childhood flash before your eyes.  You look down at a gravestone and see your name carved into the rock.  The creature before you is made of the very essence of time itself...

mobs.long_desc: A huge elephant with curved tusks and thick wooly hair trudges through the snow.
mobs.desc: Mammoths are gigantic elephants covered in thick wooly hair.  Their tusks are curved and they are know to be aggressive if provoked, even slightly. Their huge size alone make them formidable foes in combat.

mobs.long_desc: A thin man cloaked in white furs seems to blend in with the surrounding snow.
mobs.desc: This elegant creature before you belongs to a race of mysterious elves know as Frost Elves.  They thrive in the coldest of climates.  He appears to be a scout of some sort judging by the way he watches you carefully.  Dressed completely in white, he is hard to make out against the snowy background.

mobs.long_desc: A young elf, apparently a noble of sorts, watches you intently.
mobs.desc: This young elf watches you intently, apparently trying to determine if you pose a threat to his homeland.  He seems to be a well-placed member of the Frost Elf society, judging by the quality of his clothes.

mobs.long_desc: A black, bloated demon with huge bat wings stomps through the snow.
mobs.desc: This huge demon has black shiny skin and huge muscular forearms.  A pair of gigantic bat wings flex in the cold air.  The right arm of this demon ends in huge pincers and fire bursts from its nose when it breaths.  Wherever this demon steps the snow is turned back in colour.

mobs.long_desc: An elderly man with long braided hair welcomes you with a smile.
mobs.desc: The man before you has a friendly looking face, and exudes a comradely warmth. He is tall and slender and moves in a way that reminds you of some of the better swordsmen you have seen. His intelligent eyes watch you closely.

mobs.long_desc: An elderly woman smiles warmly at you.
mobs.desc: Despite her age, she seems to be in full health and stands proudly. She has the look of a scholar and you suspect that unnatural forces may be to blame for her powerful appearance.

mobs.long_desc: A handsome young man leans against the wall fondling some dice.
mobs.desc: He is tall and broad shouldered, but his movements are quick and decisive. You expect that to challenge him at dice would probably result in you losing all your hard earned cash, and probably most of your belongings.

mobs.long_desc: A young boy rests on the bed reading a tattered book.
mobs.desc: This boy looks far too tall for the width of his body, seeming skinnier than a beanpole.  His hair is unruly and his general demeanor is that of a person too busy to bother with mere details.

mobs.long_desc: A beautiful young woman with hair the colour of the setting sun is sewing here.
mobs.desc: This is quite simply one of the most beautiful women you have ever seen. Her grace is apparent in the way she walks, almost floating above the ground.

mobs.long_desc: A young man, obviously a keep guard, stands here watching you carefully.
mobs.desc: This young man looks ready to spring into action at the slightest provocation. His master's good will to strangers is obviously an alient concept to him.

mobs.long_desc: A long dark shape seems to be moving under the water.
mobs.desc: Lampreys are leech-like eels that usually dwell in deep lakes.  They are usually over 12 feet long and are characterized by a sphincter-like mouth that is ringed with sharp teeth.  Lampreys are usually a sickly green- brownish color.

mobs.long_desc: A trapper is busy during chores around the lodge.
mobs.desc: This young man is a trapper by trade who is forced to endure such harsh conditions to scrape out a meager existence.  He grumbles something about the blasted weather and his cruel boss and begs you let him continue with his work.

mobs.keywords: mage war injured-warmage war-mage lirne majorglobe-questmaster
mobs.long_desc: An injured war mage sits in a chair by the fire, recuperating.
mobs.desc: This man's skin is pale and sallow, reflecting his ill state.  Small lesions cover his hands and face, but the remainder of his body is shrouded in a heavy red robe, some parts looking redder than others.  His wounds look magically inflicted, and unlikely to heal on their own.  His breathing is heavy and labored.

mobs.long_desc: A thin man dressed in rich white furs strides about the tower.
mobs.desc: This elegant creature belongs to a race of isolated Frost Elves who thrive in the coldest of climates.  He seems to be some sort of court official, striding about with an innate regal nature.  Dressed in rich white fur robes, he looks like some sort of consul or nobleman.

mobs.long_desc: A tall, slender elf dressed in thin white armor strolls about silently.
mobs.desc: Hard-faced and stoic, this young-looking frost elf is charged with the protection of this tower.  He obviously takes this charge very seriously, and is undoubtedly very adept, for he strolls around the room fleet as a shadow. He is armed in gleaming white metal covering a beautiful blue smock.

mobs.long_desc: Gliding effortlessly along the floor, a pale elf passes by calmly.
mobs.desc: She is slender and fair-skinned, untouched by the snowy elements billowing outside the tower.  Dressed in a full-length white robe, long wavy tresses spill out of her cowl, the dark locks sharply contrasting her pale skin and clothing.  Serenity and composure mark her face, which looks almost expressionless.

mobs.long_desc: Dressed in thin white armor, a vigilant elf supervises the vicinity.
mobs.desc: Impassively standing on one side of the hall, this Frost Elf watches the entire hall out of her peripheral vision, nearly as sharp as direct sight.  Her arms hang docilely by her side, ready to move at a moment's notice.  A thin white fur robe is draped over her body, covered by strange white plate armor, thinner than the elven blade hanging from her belt.

mobs.long_desc: An elderly elf smiles kindly, serving as the library's keeper.
mobs.desc: Probably hundreds of years old, this eldery elven man is just beginning to develop wrinkles about his eyes.  A welcoming, benevolent smile marks his face, and he looks ready to assist scholars about the library in any way he can. His long graying hair is tied behind his head, spilling over his bright white robes.

mobs.long_desc: A pretty elven girl tends the bar, serving drinks and snacks.
mobs.desc: This young girl smiles very pleasantly, ready to serve her fellow elves quickly and competently.  She scurries about behind the bar, preparing decanters of elven spirits and plates of delectable elven fare.  Her face shines with amiability, its delicate features coming across as quite attractive and pretty. She wears white robes similar to others in the tower, with a bright blue apron on top.

mobs.long_desc: Peering out of a window, a young frost elf watches the countryside below.
mobs.desc: Apparently quite young, this elven lookout has sharp brown eyes, watching the surrounding countryside for intruders.  His features are delicate but handsome, and his brown hair is tied behind his head in a knot.  He is dressed in light white armor, but probably doesn't expect to see much battle from up here.

mobs.long_desc: Obviously aristocratic, a tall, slender man strides by silently.
mobs.desc: Seemingly totally disinterested in his surroundings, this aloof well-dressed elf glides through the room effortlessly.  Dark locks of hair flow from his head, hanging freely over his white robes.  A bright blue sash is slung over his shoulder, likely signifying him as a senator or delegate.  He doesn't seem likely to bother with you, but probably wouldn't be too happy if you bothered him.

mobs.long_desc: Nose buried in a book, an elven scholar ignores his surroundings.
mobs.desc: Fair-skinned and slight, this elf probably rarely sees the light of day, except through a window.  Relatively untrained in the elven martial arts, this elf has instead devoted his life to studying the Great Library's books.  Nevertheless quite nimble, he shuffles by as well as an elf can shuffle, reading a large tome of knowledge.

objects.ground: A large key made from the bone of a mammoth lies here.

extras.text: This key is made from the leg bone of a mammoth.  You notice that there are some strange scrath marks on one side the key.  However, it is impossible to say what they are from.

objects.ground: An ivory key made from the tusk of a mammoth lies here.

extras.text: Other than the fact that this key is made from the tusk of a mammoth it is not unlike the thousands of other keys you have seen.

objects.ground: A key made of a very light silvery metal lies here.

extras.text: This key is made of very light silvery metal.  You have never seen this type of metal before but you have heard about it.  It is rumored that only elves hold the secret to its constuction.

objects.ground: An ebony key carved with a strange emblem lies here.

extras.text: This key bears the emblem of the clan Ysgarran on it: a snow serpent coiled around a sword.  Other than that it is no different from any other key.

objects.ground: A large wooden crate lies here.

extras.text: This large crate is made of thick wooden planks held together with rusting nails and thick metal bands.

objects.ground: A bottle of whiskey looks rather inviting.

extras.text: This bottle of whiskey is crudely made of a colored glass.  Nothing on the bottle identifies its maker or who distilled the whiskey. You become intrigued by this little mystery.  Then again it is only a bottle of whiskey...

objects.ground: A ration of salted meat is being stored here.

extras.text: This slab of salted meat is wrapped in rough paper.  The salt appears to be only mildly succesful in keeping this meat from rotting.  A tinge of brownish-green can be seen within the meat.  Next time don't look at your food...just eat it.

objects.short: the key to the Plane of Doom
objects.ground: A dagger made of a strangely dark metal lies here.

extras.text: This dagger is made of very strange, very heavy material.  It has a bluish-black tinge and is very shiny. The dagger itself is carved to appear as two intertwined snakes. Their tails form the blade of the dagger, while their heads form the pommel.

objects.short: a velvet cloak, lined in wolf fur
objects.ground: A heavy cloak lined with wolf fur lies neatly folded here.

extras.text: This cloak is made of very heavy, and warm, material.  The outer edges have been lined with thick reddish wolf fur.  It is an extremely beautiful cloak. The image of a howling wolf has been sewn onto the back of the cloak with great skill and love.

objects.ground: A cloak made out of the fur of a giant lynx lies here.

extras.text: This large cloak is made from the fur of a giant lynx.  The material is smooth and the workmanship is flawless.  The interior of the cloak is lined with a white fur, maybe snow rabbit or snow leopard.  The clasp is made of gold and is carved to appear like some sort of winged snake.  This cloak appears very, very valuable.

objects.ground: A heavy cloak made of animal fur lies in a pile here.

extras.text: This huge cloak is made from the fur of some unidentified animal.  The material is coarse and the workmanship leaves something to be desired, but it looks warm, and that's what really matters.

objects.ground: The pelt of a giant lynx lies here.

extras.text: This pelt is from a Giant Lynx, a mysterious and elusive beast.  It is sure to fetch quite a sum at a trader's post.

objects.ground: A cloak made of mammoth fur lies in a heap.

extras.text: This heavy cloak is made from the fur of a wooly mammoth.  The fur is long and coarse, but the cloak is very warm.

objects.ground: A banded leather jerkin rests here.
A pair of leather chausses lies discarded here.

extras.text: This piece of armor is made of hardened leather and is made to protect the legs of the wearer.  They are not of particularly high quality but they are made well enough to fulfull their task.

objects.ground: A leather gorget lies discarded here.

extras.text: The gorget is piece of leather armor that protects the neck and upper shoulders.  Usually it is made of metal however this one is made of hardened, boiled leather.

objects.ground: A 10' long glaive rests against the wall.

extras.text: This is a rather primitive weapon and exteremly easy to make.  It consists of a 3' long knife on the end of a long pole.  Although primitive it functions quite well as a weapon.

objects.ground: A chain camail lies in a heap.

extras.text: Fine chain links and flawless craftsmanship make up this chain camail.  It is surprisingly light for a camail and you wonder if perhaps some sort of magic went into its creation...

objects.short: a pair of iron plated boots
objects.ground: Here lies a pair of plated boots.

extras.text: These are a pair of leather boots to which hinged metal plates have been added. They provide better protection than plain leather boots and offer more mobility than boots made completely out of metal.

objects.ground: A gleaming sapphire ring lies forgotten here.

extras.text: This ring is made of the purest gold with a large glowing sapphire set into it.  An inscription around the sapphire is expertly carved into the gold.  It reads, "Tyme shalt only make myne love for thee stronger."

objects.ground: A thin elven blade has been left here.

extras.text: This blade looks quite similar to a regular longsword, but is much thinner and the metal seems much stronger.  It is extremely light, and a few test swings prove it to be a fine, expertly crafted weapon.

objects.ground: A huge club made from the tusk of a mammoth lies here.

extras.text: This heavy club is apparently made from the tusk of a mammoth.  Judging by the chips and dried blood, this club has seen much use recently.

objects.short: a longsword with a spiky crossguard
objects.ground: A steel longsword with a spiky crossguard has been discarded here.

extras.text: Its a long sword.  Never seen one of these before?

objects.short: a Book: The Lost Library of Shiran
objects.ground: A tattered book lies here.

extras.text: Title: The Lost Library of Shiran Author: Karlix the Omniscient "...and a great civilization rose and prospered.  They achieved such wealth and status and they did not want the knowledge they had gathered and strove for to be lost to succeeding generations.  So they built a great library on an island off the coast of their great city.  Into this library they placed all the knowledge they had gathered over the centuries.  Great tomes about life, mythical creatures, far away and mythical lands, great items of magic, etc, etc.  Such was the knowledge that they possessed that it is rumored the gods got jealous and deemed the information kept in that library too great for mortal minds.  And so, it is rumored it was the gods who destroyed the Library and with it all the knowledge kept therein..."

objects.ground: A glass globe containing snowflakes lies here.

extras.text: As you peer into the globe you can see a courtyard and a tall tower amongst the snow.  Hang on, little people shapes are MOVING in there.  This is very disturbing!  When shaken, the snow inside flutters around madly, but the little people seem unaffected.

objects.ground: A small canoe has been left here.
A small jar of dirty green viscous liquid sits here.

extras.text: This salve is in a tiny glass jar plugged with a small piece of cork.  The liniment itself is a dirty green color, thick and viscous like an herbal mash.

objects.ground: A small drab-gray rock sits on the ground.

extras.text: Dark gray and flaky, this sedimentary rock is nevertheless quite uninteresting. The chunk of shale is about the size of a toe.

objects.ground: A thin, tightly-bound book rests here crumbling.

extras.text: This is a thin leatherbound book, with only a few pages inside.  The title on the cover reads, 'Ye Paladin Spellbook'.  Unlike most spellbooks, the contents seem to be written in plain, albeit ancient, common.

objects.ground: A small sphere of elemental energy hovers just above the ground.

extras.text: It glows a livid &2green&0, swirling about in a tight sphere of energy.

objects.ground: A small sphere of elemental energy hovers just above the ground.

extras.text: It glows a chilling &6blue&0, swirling with internal energy.

objects.ground: A small sphere of elemental energy hovers just above the ground.

extras.text: The sphere glows with a watery &4blue&0 light, fluid swirling vigorously about inside.

objects.ground: A small sphere of elemental energy hovers here.

extras.text: This spherical ward glows an angry &1red&0, and a plasma swirls about within.

objects.ground: A small sphere of elemental energy hovers just above the ground.

extras.text: It glows from within a pure &bwhite&0, swirling flecks circulating like a light show.

objects.ground: A tiny crystal pendant glints from the ground.

extras.text: It is a small piece of transparent crystal that reflects and refracts light like a tiny star.  An odd field of energy surrounds it, preventing actual physical contact with the crystal itself.

objects.ground: Flecks of light whirl across the surface of a black wand resting here.

extras.text: The wand is slender, formed from brilliant high-clarity glass.  Its surface is covered in tiny glints of light, swirling about and whipping up miniature two-dimensional tornados that crash into each other.

objects.ground: A rod of force conduction lies here glowing.

extras.text: The rod is about the height of a tall halfling and seems to be perfectly smooth gold.  Energy crackles along it, sizzling the air around it, but cool to the touch.

objects.ground: A miniscule shield hanging from a thin chain necklace lies in mess here.

extras.text: The tiny miniature shield looks to be cast from a heavy iron.  It is strung on a thin metallic chain long enough to be used as a necklace.  The talisman is frigid to the touch, seeming to absorb all the heat around it.

objects.ground: A slender white breastplate rests on the ground glistening.

extras.text: This breastplate is somewhat small, likely designed for an elf or slender human.  It is formed from a strange metal, ice-cold to the touch, yet not melting in heat.  The plate is much thinner than steel, not even as thick as most swords.  A series of leather straps on the back may be tied together to hold the breastplate on.

objects.ground: Thin white legplates lie crisscrossed on the ground.

extras.text: Cast from an odd white metal, the outside of these greaves are cold as ice, but can withstand quite a bit of damage.  They are padded on the inside with white fur, preventing the frigid white metal from touching skin.  The plate metal is slightly curved and much thinner than average steel, undoubtedly created by some uncomprehensible elven miracle.

objects.ground: A miniscule speck of white almost escapes detection here.

extras.text: Small and round, this ear stud is made of an odd white metal and shaped somewhat like a little sphere.  It feels cool against skin, strangely drawn to it as if magnetic, allowing it to stick to an ear without a piercing.

objects.ground: A large pile of white fur shines in the light.

extras.text: Flawlessly made from the fur of a giant lynx, these furry robes are silky and ticklish against the skin.  The inside lining is a soft linen material, and a golden hem runs along the cowl and sleeves.  These robes are probably quite valuable.

objects.ground: Complex elven runes run up and down a deep-brown maple staff resting here.

extras.text: The staff has intricate elven runes across its length, telling of histories long ago past.  Finely chiseled from a heavy dark brown maple wood, it has a carved handle two-thirds of the way up so it may be held without covering any of the runes.

objects.ground: A semicircle of thin white metal lies on the floor.

extras.text: This thin visor is cast from a mysterious white metal.  Apparently stronger than steel, despite its thinness, it is almost impossible to deform.  A strap hanging around the back allows the visor to be worn on the head to protect the face.  Several vertical slits give the wearer a clear view of the surroundings.

objects.ground: A small diamond-shaped shield rests here guarding no one.

extras.text: Displaying an elaborate elven crest on its front, this sleet-white shield is only as wide as a forearm is long, but used effectively could provide decent protection.  The metal of the guard is fantastically thin, yet seems as strong as, if not stronger than, well-tempered steel.

The elaborate elven crest is painted on the front of the sleet shield with amazing detail.  It depicts a great lynx running on a blue background, with a waving banner above it.  Some ancient elven runes are written across the banner, but below the crest, the name Shiran appears in common script.

triggers.name: avalanche
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 wecho You notice some larger clumps of snow slipping onto you. wait 2s wecho AVALANCHE!!! Run for your lives! wait 1s wteleport all 53567 endif

triggers.name: smothering_avalanche
triggers.commands: set person %self.people% while %person% set next %people.next_in_room% eval tithe %person.level% * 2 wsend %person% You are finding it harder to breathe now...and you can feel your life ebbing away. wdamage %person% %tithe% set person %next% done

triggers.name: slip_on_trail
triggers.commands: wait 2 set rnd %random.char% * this trigger is in multiple rooms, socheck we are in right one if %rnd.room% == %actor.room% * check for flying first... if !(%rnd.aff_flagged[FLY]%) set dam 0 wsend %rnd% You slip on the icy path and fall! wechoaround %rnd% %rnd.name% slips and falls! switch %actor.room% case 53530 eval dam %dam% + 100 case 53529 eval dam %dam% + 75 case 53528 eval dam %dam% + 50 case 53527 eval dam %dam% + 25 done wteleport %rnd% 53417 wdamage %rnd% %dam% wat 53417 wforce %rnd% look wat 53417 wechoaround %rnd% %rnd.name% comes tumbling down the ice trail from the east. endif endif

triggers.name: fv_ysgarran_greet1
triggers.commands: say Please enjoy the hospitality of our keep. smile %actor.name%

triggers.name: fv_ysgarran_greet2
triggers.commands: msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Hello Traveler, I am Ysgarran' bow

triggers.name: fv_adwen_greet
triggers.commands: msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Hello Traveller, my name is Adwen.' curtsey %actor.name%

triggers.name: fv_Gwion_greet
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 wait 1 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Hello Traveler, my name is Gwion' bow else wait 1 poke %actor.name% say fancy a game of dice? mforce %actor% emote mutters an excuse and looks around for an exit. end

triggers.name: fv_Gwion_entry
triggers.commands: wait 1 peer wait 2 sigh say anyone fancy a game of dice?

triggers.name: fv_Aeron_greet
triggers.commands: msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Hello Traveler, my name is Aeron.' emote turns a page in his book.

triggers.name: fv_Aeron_entry
triggers.commands: set rnd %random.char% if %rnd.vnum% == -1 mechoabout %rnd% %self.name% glances up at %rnd.name% then goes back to reading. msend %rnd% %self.name% glances up at you then goes back to reading. else end

triggers.name: fv_Briant_greet
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Hello Traveler, my name is Briant.' if %actor.sex% == male msend %actor% As Briant smiles a welcome to you you feel yourself smiling like a fool! else msend %actor% As Briant smiles a welcome to you you feel an overwhelming peace. end else end

triggers.name: fv_guard_entry
triggers.commands: emote peers around the room as if he expects to see an enemy in the shadows.

triggers.name: fv_guard_greet
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 consider %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% tells you, 'Ok %actor.name%, we don't want any trouble here.' else bow end

triggers.name: fv_guard_rand
triggers.commands: emote mutters to himself about his crappy posting to this forsaken corner of the world.

triggers.name: fv_poke_Aeron
triggers.commands: if %arg% /= aeron whap %actor.name% glare %actor.name% wait 2 mecho %self.name% say, 'Don't interrupt me reading again, unless you have something better mecho &0for me than this book.' endif

triggers.name: timetravel_shake
triggers.commands: switch %cmd% case s case sh return 0 halt done if %self.name% /= %arg% if %actor.wearing[53424]% osend %actor% You shake the glass globe up and down vigorously. oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% shakes a glass globe up and down vigorously. if %actor.room% == 53466 || %actor.room% == 53570 oecho The snow in the globe swirls...and your vision blurs for a second! if %actor.room% == 53466 oteleport all 53570 oforce all look set person %actor% set i %person.group_size% if %i% set a 1 else set a 0 endif while %i% >= %a% set person %actor.group_member[%a%]% if %person.room% == %actor.room% if !%person.quest_stage[frost_valley_quest]% quest start frost_valley_quest %person% endif quest variable frost_valley_quest %person% shake 1 elseif %person% eval i %i% + 1 endif eval a %a% + 1 done elseif %actor.room% == 53570 oteleport all 53466 oforce all look endif endif else osend %actor% You need to hold it to shake it! endif else return 0 endif

triggers.name: look_into_globe
triggers.commands: wait 3 set snowglobe snow-globe set glassglobe glass-globe if %actor.room% == 53466 osend %actor% Hmm, the view in the globe is very similar to the one in this room, except the tower is whole. elseif %actor.room% == 53570 osend %actor% Wow, the globe is a miniature model of this room, freaky! endif

triggers.name: **UNUSED**
triggers.commands: return 0

triggers.name: chaos_demon_death_banish
triggers.commands: set person %actor% set i %actor.group_size% if %i% unset person while %i% > 0 set person %actor.group_member[%i%]% if %person.room% == %self.room% if %person.quest_stage[banish]% == 5 quest advance banish %person.name% msend %person% &5&bA single letter pops into your mind. - &6&bG&0 endif endif eval i %i% - 1 done elseif %person.quest_stage[banish]% == 5 quest advance banish %person.name% msend %person% &5&bA single letter pops into your mind. - &6&bG&0 endif

triggers.name: major_globe_greet
triggers.commands: if (%actor.class% == sorcerer || %actor.class% == cryomancer || %actor.class% == pyromancer) && (%actor.level% >= 57) if %actor.has_completed[major_globe_spell]% halt endif wait 1s switch %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% case 1 case 2 case 3 case 4 case 5 emote coughs fitfully. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Have you brought me the salve from Earle?' msend %actor% %self.name% looks at you pleadingly. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% looks at %actor.name% pleadingly. break case 6 case 7 msend %actor% %self.name% turns to look at you. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% turns to look at %actor.name%. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Welcome back, were you able to find the spellbook?' break case 8 msend %actor% %self.name% hops up from his chair as you enter. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% hops up from his chair as %actor.name% enters. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% comes limping over to you. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% limps over to %actor.name%. eval wards_left 5 - %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_count]% if %wards_left% > 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'The wards!  The wards!  Do you have them?  We still need %wards_left% of them! else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Just one ward left!  Do you have it?' endif break case 9 case 10 msend %actor% %self.name% bounds over to you. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% runs over to %actor.name%. wait 1s set final_item %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:final_item]% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Do you have %get.obj_shortdesc[%final_item%]% to channel the power?  Please say you do!' break default msend %actor% %self.name% turns his head to look at you. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% turns his head to look at %actor.name%. cough wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You're a %actor.class%!  Perhaps you can &6&bassist&0 me.' done endif

triggers.name: major_globe_speech_assist
triggers.commands: if (%actor.vnum% == -1) && (%actor.class% == sorcerer || %actor.class% == cryomancer || %actor.class%== pyromancer) && (%actor.level% >= 57) && !(%actor.has_completed[major_globe_spell]%) && (%actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 0) quest start major_globe_spell %actor.name% wait 2 emote nods slowly. wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Yes...  I was recently defeated by a rogue demon roving this valley.  He injured me terribly, but...' emote breaks into a coughing fit! wait 2s emote recomposes himself. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I can't let down Ysgarran, though.  I must defeat the demon.' wait 3 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'But not in this state.' sigh wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Earle of the druids owes me a favor.  Please visit him in my behalf and acquire a salve for my wounds.' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Tell him &6&b"Lirne sends me."&0  I'm sure he will help.' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You can check your &6&b[spell progress]&0 with me if you forget what to do.' endif

triggers.name: major_globe_speech_lirne_sends_me
triggers.commands: wait 1 if %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 1 quest advance major_globe_spell %actor.name% smirk msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah yes, Lirne.  He never writes and only drops by when he's injured.' wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well, what got him this time?  Lions?  Tigers?  Be- ah, it doesn't matter.' sigh wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I will prepare an all-purpose healing salve for him.  But you will need to retrieve the components for me.' ponder wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'First, I will need some &3&bshale&0 to create a base.  You can probably find some on the nearby volcanic island.' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Return to me when you have procured the shale.' elseif %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well yes, I already know that.  Did you get the shale yet?' elseif %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Yes, yes, I know!  You told me already!' else smirk msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I doubt it.' endif

triggers.name: major_globe_greet_load_shale
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 2 mjunk majorglobe-shale mload obj 53451 wait 2s if %get.mob_count[48125]% && (%self.room% == 48112) mecho The savage children laugh and play, tossing a rock between themselves. wait 1s mecho One child, larger than the rest, suddenly grabs the rock out of the air. mecho She smiles wickedly and prances away from the group. hold shale wait 3s mecho The other savage children sniffle and start playing another game. else mecho The lone savage child looks around herself and sighs. hold shale wait 3s mecho The savage child plays with a rock in her hands. endif endif

triggers.name: Lirne Refuse
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% switch %object.vnum% case 53451 if %stage% == 2 set response Give this to Earle, not me. else set response No thanks. endif break case 58002 if %stage% == 3 set response Give this to Earle, not me. else set response No thanks. endif break case 58609 if %stage% == 4 set response Give this to Earle, not me. else set response No thanks. endif break default set response No thanks. done if %response% return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 2 say %response% endif

triggers.name: major_globe_command_search
triggers.commands: switch %cmd% case s return 0 halt done if (%actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 6) && (%actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:room]% == %actor.room%) wload obj 53452 wechoaround %actor% %actor.name% finds %get.obj_shortdesc[53452]%! wsend %actor% &bYou have found %get.obj_shortdesc[53452]%!&0 quest advance major_globe_spell %actor.name% else return 0 endif

triggers.name: **UNUSED**
triggers.commands: * Allow sell and south to work in this room return 0

triggers.name: major_globe_elemental_greet
triggers.commands: switch %self.vnum% * plant elemental case 2328 set load_ward 53453 set wand %actor.quest_stage[acid_wand]% break * Mist elemental case 2806 case 2807 set load_ward 53454 set wand %actor.quest_stage[air_wand]% break * Water elemental case 2808 case 2809 case 48631 set load_ward 53455 break * flame elemental case 5212 case 12523 case 48500 case 48511 case 48512 set load_ward 53456 set wand %actor.quest_stage[fire_wand]% break * ice elemental case 53312 case 53313 case 48630 case 48632 set load_ward 53457 set wand %actor.quest_stage[ice_wand]% break done * If random is 1 if %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 8 || %wand% == 8 set now %time.stamp% * If there was a previous time stamp, check against it if %last_enter% * If 2 minutes have passed, roll for chance to load again if %now% - %last_enter% >= 2 set do_load %random.4% endif * If first time entering, roll for chance to load else set do_load %random.4% endif * If rolled 1, load if %do_load% == 1 if (%load_ward%) mload obj %load_ward% if %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 8 quest variable major_globe_spell %actor.name% ward_%load_ward% 1 endif wait 1 msend %actor% &b%self.name% flares briefly as you approach.&0 mechoaround %actor% &b%self.name% flares briefly as %actor.name% approaches.&0 endif * If didn't roll 1, save time stamp so questor must wait 2 minutes else * Save time stamp set last_enter %now% global last_enter endif endif

triggers.name: major_globe_channel_greet
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 9 switch %self.vnum% case 2322 set load_channel 53458 break case 58008 set load_channel 53459 break case 16003 set load_channel 53460 break case 23711 set load_channel 53461 done if %load_channel% mjunk majorglobe-channel mload obj %load_channel% wait 1 msend %actor% &b%self.name%'s eyes flash briefly as you approach.&0 mechoaround %actor% &b%self.name%'s eyes flash briefly as %actor.name% approaches.&0 endif endif

triggers.name: major_globe_hint
triggers.commands: scratch say Lirne has been gone for quite a while now... wait 2s say I wonder where that rascal has gotten to. ponder

triggers.name: major_globe_hint_speech
triggers.argument_list: gone? gone while? while rascal? rascal lirne? lirne
triggers.commands: wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Yeah, Lirne.  He disappeared a little while ago on a job in Frost Valley.' frown wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'None of us have heard from him since.  I hope that ol' warmage hasn't gotten himself into more trouble than he can handle.'

triggers.name: major_globe_channel_advance
triggers.commands: if %victim% if %victim.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 9 quest advance major_globe_spell %victim.name% endif else if %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 9 quest advance major_globe_spell %actor.name% endif endif

triggers.name: major_globe_earle_receive_shale
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 2 * chunk of shale wait 1 quest advance major_globe_spell %actor.name% mjunk majorglobe-shale nod msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'This will do.' ponder wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Next you will need to retrieve some alcohol for the salve.  Make it &3&bsake&0, actually.  That would be best.' wait 5s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well, go on then!  Don't keep Lirne waiting.' emote starts crushing the shale in a bowl. endif

triggers.name: major_globe_earle_receive_sake
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 3 * bottle of sake wait 1 quest advance major_globe_spell %actor.name% mjunk sake msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Good, good.  This will mix well.  Just one more ingredient.  We'll need some &3&bmarigold poultice&0 to complete this salve.' think wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'It's commonly used by healers, perhaps you should track one down.' endif

triggers.name: major_globe_earle_receive_marigold
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% == 4 * marigold salve wait 1 quest advance major_globe_spell %actor.name% mjunk marigold-poultice msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Excellent, let me just finish this salve then...' emote begins mixing the items in a clay bowl. wait 2s emote recites a short incantation over the bowl. wait 2s emote pours the salve into a tiny jar. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'There we are, this will surely cure whatever ails Lirne.' mload obj 53450 give herbal-salve %actor.name% wait 5s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well, don't keep him waiting.  Go, go!' endif

triggers.name: Major Globe Lirne receive 1
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% if (%stage% == 5) quest advance major_globe_spell %actor.name% set room %random.5% switch %room% * Haunted House case 1 eval room 16903 break * Tower in the Wastes case 2 eval room 12553 break * Mystwatch case 3 eval room 16063 break * Abbey case 4 eval room 18582 break * Sunken case 5 eval room 53079 break * Sunken default eval room 53078 done quest variable major_globe_spell %actor.name% room %room% wait 1 mjunk majorglobe-salve smile emote sniffs %get.obj_shortdesc[53450]%. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Smells powerful.' wait 1s emote begins spreading the salve across his lesions. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I can feel it working.' smile wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well, no time to waste.  The demon still walks the valley.  To defeat it, we will need to combat its magic.' ponder wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I think I know a way...  Yes...' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Lore speaks of a spell powerful enough to deflect great magic.' ponder wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'The spellbook containing the spell was lost, though.  Perhaps you can find it.' wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, '&b&6Search&0 in each &6&bstack&0 and &6&blibrary&0!  Surely it will be found in one of them.' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I'm sure it still exists...  It must.' wait 5s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Well?  Quickly, now!' elseif (%stage% < 5) return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Perhaps you should do the steps of this quest in order.  Go talk to Earle.' elseif (%stage% > 5) wait 1 mjunk majorglobe-salve msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'But... you've already given me this.  I'm healed already.' endif

triggers.name: Major Globe Lirne receive 2
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% if (%stage% == 7) quest advance major_globe_spell %actor.name% wait 1 mjunk majorglobe-spellbook gasp msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'This is fantastic!  I knew you would find it.' emote opens the spellbook and begins leafing through it. wait 3s emote begins to look very excited. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Ah ha!  Here it is...  The spell to protect against powerful magic.  We'll need some &3&belemental wards&0 to power it, though.' snap wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You must banish some elementals and return their energies to me.  I think five should do it: mist, water, ice, flame, or plant.' wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Yes... go and &6&bbanish five unique elementals&0 and bring back their energies!' elseif (%stage% < 7) return 0 eyebrow wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'How could you have found this?  Do the quest in order!' elseif (%stage% > 7) wait 1 mjunk majorglobe-spellbook msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You've already brought me this! endif

triggers.name: Major Globe Lirne receive 3
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% if (%stage% == 8) wait 1 set ward %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_%object.vnum%]% set number %object.vnum% mjunk majorglobe-ward if %ward% == 0 frown msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'How could you have gotten this?  Do the quest yourself!' elseif %ward% == 1 eval ward %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_%number%]% + 1 quest variable major_globe_spell %actor.name% ward_%number% %ward% unset ward eval wards %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_count]% + 1 quest variable major_globe_spell %actor.name% ward_count %wards% eval wards_left 5 - %wards% smile if %wards_left% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Excellent, only %wards_left% more, and we'll be almost ready.' else quest advance major_globe_spell %actor.name% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Okay!  That's enough elemental wards to power the spell.  We only need one more item to channel the power...' think emote quickly studies the spellbook again. set item %random.4% switch %item% case 1 set item 53458 set place in a border keep break case 2 set item 53459 set place on an emerald isle break case 3 set item 53460 set place within a misty fortress break default set item 53461 set place in an underground city done quest variable major_globe_spell %actor.name% final_item %item% wait 3s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Yes, the last item for the spell is here.  It is &3&b%get.obj_shortdesc[%item%]%&0.' emote thinks hard for a moment. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'It is rumored that it can be found &6&b%place%&0.' wait 4s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Quickly, go now and retrieve it so that we might defeat the demon!' endif elseif %ward% == 2 eval wards_left 5 - %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_count]% eyebrow if %wards_left% > 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You've already given me this ward.  We still need %wards_left% different ones! else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You've already given me this ward.  We still need %wards_left% different one! endif endif elseif (%stage% < 8) return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I'm not quite ready to deal with those yet.  Do the quest in order.' elseif (%stage% > 8) wait 1 mjunk majorglobe-ward msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'You already gave me all the elemental wards!' endif

triggers.name: Major Globe Lirne receive 4
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% if (%stage% == 10) if %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:final_item]% == %object.vnum% wait 1 mjunk majorglobe-channel mskillset %actor.name% major globe emote grins excitedly. msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Yes!  Now I can cast the spell... and defeat the demon!' emote holds the wards in one hand. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% starts casting &3&b'major globe'&0... wait 2s emote completes his spell... emote closes his eyes and utters the words, 'wiyaf travo'. mecho &1&bA shimmering globe of force wraps around %self.name%'s body.&0 wait 2s smile msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'I feel much better too!  My sincerest thanks for your help.  As thanks, I offer you knowledge of this ancient spell also.' wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% stares at you and utters a quick incantation. msend %actor% &7&bYou feel your skill in spell knowledge improving!&0 mechoaround %actor% %self.name% stares at %actor.name% and utters a quick incantation. wait 1s quest complete major_globe_spell %actor.name% wait 1s msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Now I must take my leave.  Wish me well!' emote hurries out of the room. mgoto 1100 mpurge %self% else set response This isn't what the spell calls for... endif elseif (%stage% < 10) set response I'm not ready for that yet.  Do the quest in the right order. endif if %response% return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. wait 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, '%response%' endif

triggers.name: major_globe_quest_status_checker
triggers.commands: wait 2 set stage %actor.quest_stage[major_globe_spell]% switch %stage% case 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Find Earle and tell him &6&b"Lirne sends me."&0' break case 2 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Find &3&bshale&0 on Fiery Island.  Bring it to Earle on Griffin Island.' break case 3 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Find &3&bsake&0 in Odaishyozen.  Bring it to Earle on Griffin Island.' break case 4 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Find a &3&bmarigold poultice&0 on a healer in South Caelia.  Bring it to Earle on Griffin Island.' break case 5 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Bring me the &3&bsalve&0 Earle prepared.' break case 6 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Find the &3&blost spellbook&0 in a &6&blibrary&0 or &6&bstack&0.' break case 7 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Bring &3&b%get.obj_shortdesc[53452]%&0 to me.' break case 8 set plant %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_53453]% set mist %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_53454]% set water %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_53455]% set flame %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_53456]% set ice %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_53457]% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Bring &3&b5 elemental wards&0, one each from a mist, a water, an ice, a flame, and a plant elemental.' eval wards %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:ward_count]% if %wards% msend %actor% You have found: &3&b%wards% wards&0 else msend %actor% You have found: &3&b0 wards&0 endif if %plant% == 2 msend %actor% %get.obj_shortdesc[53453]% endif if %mist% == 2 msend %actor% %get.obj_shortdesc[53454]% endif if %water% == 2 msend %actor% %get.obj_shortdesc[53455]% endif if %flame% == 2 msend %actor% %get.obj_shortdesc[53456]% endif if %ice% == 2 msend %actor% %get.obj_shortdesc[53457]% endif break case 9 set final_item %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:final_item]% switch %final_item% case 53458 set place in a border keep break case 53459 set place on an emerald isle break case 53460 set place within a misty fortress break default set place in an underground city done msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Find &3&b%get.obj_shortdesc[%final_item%]%&0 in %place%.' break case 10 set final_item %actor.quest_variable[major_globe_spell:final_item]% msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Bring me &6&b%get.obj_shortdesc[%final_item%]%&0.' done

triggers.name: Block player exit
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 if %actor.level% < 100 return 0 wsend %actor% &bA mysterious powerful force pushes you back.&0 else return 1 wsend %actor% &bThe room you are entering is part of the past elven tower illusion.&0 wsend %actor% &bIt should not be reachable by any player. Look BUILDNOTE for more info.&0 endif endif

triggers.name: Destroy past elf
triggers.commands: if (%actor.vnum% >= 53500) & (%actor.vnum% <= 53508) return 0 wsend %actor% You can't go that way! endif

triggers.name: Frost elf wield blade
triggers.commands: if !%wielded% if %self.wearing[53420]% emote whispers, 'Trespassers!' rem elven-blade wield elven-blade set wielded %time.stamp% global wielded endif endif

triggers.name: Frost elf remove blade
triggers.commands: if %wielded% set now %time.stamp% if %now% - 1 > %wielded% scan wait 1s rem blade wear blade belt emote returns to a more relaxed posture, watching the vicinity carefully. set wielded 0 global wielded endif endif

triggers.name: Staff damage user
triggers.commands: return 0 switch %cmd% case u halt done set aliases elaborately-chiseled-staff deep-brown-maple-staff if %self.val2% && (%arg% != ) && (%aliases% /= %arg%) && (%actor.wearing[53504]%) eval damage 480 + %random.50% odamage %actor% %damage% osend %actor% You double over in pain as %self.shortdesc% touches the ground! (&1&b%damage%&0) oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% doubles over in pain as %self.shortdesc% touches the ground! (&4%damage%&0) endif

triggers.name: **UNUSED**
triggers.commands: return 0

triggers.name: Frost elf quest death
triggers.commands: set person %actor% set i %person.group_size% if %i% set a 1 else set a 0 endif while %i% >= %a% set person %actor.group_member[%a%]% if %person.room% == %self.room% if %person.quest_variable[frost_valley_quest:shake]% == 1 quest variable frost_valley_quest %person.name% elf 1 endif elseif %person% eval i %i% + 1 endif eval a %a% + 1 done

rooms.name: Ice Tunnel
rooms.description: This wide tunnel through the ice is nearly circular in shape.  It is not as rough-hewn as the others through which you have traveled.  It leads to the east and west.

rooms.name: Ice Tunnel
rooms.description: This wide tunnel through the ice runs east and west.  A chilly wind assails your face, blowing in from the west.

rooms.name: Bend in Ice Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel carved through the ice curves here.  It leads off to the east and south.  Freezing arctic air blows in from the south.

rooms.name: Turn in Ice Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel bends here, heading off to the north and west. A slight wind whips through the tunnel from the west.

rooms.name: Ice Tunnel Entrance
rooms.description: The tunnel through the ice ends here and opens up to the outside air.  A gusty wind blows in from the tunnel opening to the west making strange noises as it races down the tunnel.  A layer of snow has been blown into the tunnel by the last storm and you can already see many footprints leading in and out of the tunnel.  The tunnel leads back to the east; to the west it opens up to the outside.

rooms.name: Clearing in Coniferous Forest
rooms.description: You are standing in a small hill overlooking a large valley that stretches out before you to the west.  To the east a small tunnel is carved through a huge mountain of solid ice.  To the west and north you are surrounded by a dense coniferous forest.  In the middle of the snow covered valley you can see a large lake.  A tall tower is built on a small island in the center of the lake and rises up like a beacon.

rooms.name: Coniferous Forest
rooms.description: You are surrounded by a dense forest of coniferous trees.  To the north and east the forest ends at the face of a large impassable mountain.  A light snow is falling covering the trees with a blanket of white.

rooms.name: Coniferous Forest
rooms.description: A light snow is falling here blanketing the ground and trees.  To the north and east the steep walls of the mountains that enclose this valley rise up before you.  Occasionally, you can hear the calls of the many creatures that make this forest their home.

rooms.name: Coniferous Forest
rooms.description: A dense forest of coniferous trees surround you.  Their branches sag with freshly fallen snow.  All around you is silence and peace.

rooms.name: Coniferous Forest
rooms.description: Old, gnarled coniferous trees surround you on all sides, their branches sagging with freshly fallen snow.  The forest is rather dense here and you cannot see very far through the forest.  The hill slopes down to the west and a light mist is creeping up from the valley floor below.

rooms.name: Coniferous Forest
rooms.description: The forest has begun to thin out here and to the west you can see a wide open valley with a large crystal tower in its center.  To the east and south a large mountain made of ice blocks any passage.  The forest thickens to the north.  Everything is blanketed in a layer of snow.

rooms.name: Coniferous Forest
rooms.description: The dark coniferous forest surrounding you is covered by a layer of fresh snow.  Snowflakes float down, slowly obscuring your tracks through the snow. To the north the forest comes up against the tall cliffs that enclose this valley.  The forest surrounds you on all other sides.

rooms.name: Coniferous Forest
rooms.description: Snowflakes gently float down onto the trees all around you.  The forest is dense here making it dark and difficult to see very far.  To the west and south the forest thins as it gets closer to the valley floor.  To the north and east the forest becomes denser.

rooms.name: Coniferous Forest
rooms.description: The forest has thinned down to only a hand full of trees here.  The forest becomes much more dense to the north and east.  A thick layer of snow covers the ground.  Through the snow you see many tracks, none of which look human in origin.  They all lead to a large opening in the ground, leading down.

rooms.name: Edge of Forest
rooms.description: You are standing at the edge of the forest.  This section of the valley floor is sparsely dotted with trees but the real forest is to the north and east.  To the south and west a large valley opens up before you.  A little ways to the west you can see a large lake and the crystal tower.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: A large mountain made of ice blocks all passage to the east and south.  To the north you can see the edge of a coniferous forest while a ways to the west you can see the lake.

rooms.name: Snow Covered Valley
rooms.description: You are standing at the northeastern most section of Frost Valley.  To the north and east a huge mountain of ice blocks any attempts at passage.  To the south is the beginning of a snow covered coniferous forest.  To the west the valley floor continues.  Wait a minute.  Is that a trail leading up the mountain to the east?

rooms.name: Edge of Forest
rooms.description: The forest becomes thinner the further west you travel.  Off to the north and west you can see the forest gives way to the sweeping valley floor.  To the south and east the forest continues.

rooms.name: Edge of Forest
rooms.description: The forest begins to give way to the vast valley floor the farther you travel to the west.  To the west is the valley floor.  The forest surrounds you on all other sides.

rooms.name: Edge of Forest
rooms.description: To the west and south the valley opens up before you.  The forest continues to the north and east.  Snow gently falls all around you slowly obscuring your tracks through the snow.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: A desolate snow covered valley stretches out on all sides.  There are no landmarks save for the tall mountains that enclose this valley and the forest off to the east.  It would be very easy to become lost and disoriented if it weren't for the huge tower to the west.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: All around you lies the flat snow covered valley floor.  To the northeast you can see a coniferous forest and to the west lies the lake.  Far off to the east perched high on one of the mountains that encloses this valley you can see some kind of structure.  It appears to be a fort of some kind.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: A large mountain of ice rises up like a giant wall to the east.  To the west you can see the shores of the great lake in the middle of the valley. Desolate snow covered valley is to the north and south.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: The steep cliff faces of the mountains that enclose this valley are to your south and east.  The valley floor continues to the north and east.  Snow blankets everything here and the falling snow quickly erases your footprints.

rooms.name: Snow Covered Valley
rooms.description: The huge expanse of Frost Valley extends before you to the south.  To the north a huge mountain of ice rises before you.  A light snow is falling, obscuring everything and limiting your vision.  A gusty wind sends shivers through your body, chilling you to the bone.

rooms.name: Snow Covered Valley
rooms.description: Falling snowflakes add a fresh layer of snow to knee deep snow you are slowly trudging through.  Off to the the west you can see the large coniferous forest that dominates the eastern section of the valley.  In all other directions the bleak whiteness of valley extends as far as you can see.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: The vast expanse of the valley floor spreads out before you to the north, south, and west.  To the east you can see the beginning of the coniferous forest that dominates the eastern section of Frost Valley.  A light snow storm is blowing in from the west.

rooms.name: Snow Covered Valley
rooms.description: The bleak whiteness of the valley stretches out before you on all sides. Off to the east you can see a coniferous forest, while to the west a ways is Frost Valley lake.  Rising out of the mists of the lake you can see the tall tower of the Frost Elves.

rooms.name: Eastern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: You are standing on the eastern edge of the large lake in the middle of Frost Valley.  To the north, east, and south all you can see is the huge snow covered valley.

rooms.name: Eastern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: To the west you can see the large lake that stands in the middle of Frost Valley.  In the center is an island that is home to the mysterious Frost Elves. To the north, south, and east you see only the snow covered valley floor.

rooms.name: Eastern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: You are standing on the eastern shore of a large lake that lies in the middle of Frost Valley.  All around you a blanket of white covers the valley floor.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: The barren valley floor surrounds you on all sides.  To the south and east can be seen the steep cliffs of the mountains that cradle this valley.  Off to the west can be seen the shores of a lake.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: Steep cliffs rise up before you to the east and south blocking all passage. To the north and west the desolate valley floor continues.  A fierce wind assails your face freezing you to the bone.

rooms.name: Snow Covered Valley
rooms.description: Tracks through the snow indicate the passage of some sort of creature recently.  They seem to head of to the east but are being covered up by the falling snow rather quickly.  To the north and west a towering mountain of ice prevents any sort of passage.  To the south and east the valley continues.

rooms.name: Snow Covered Valley
rooms.description: All around you the desolate whiteness of the valley extends as far as you can see, which isn't very far because gusty winds and falling snow combine to limit vision to only a few feet.

rooms.name: Snow Covered Valley
rooms.description: Off to the southwest you can see the rolling waters of Frost Valley lake. The snow is coming down quite heavily now and you begin to wish you could find shelter from the falling snow and freezing temperatures.  The only shelter you can see, however, is the tall tower of the mysterious Frost Elves.

rooms.name: Northeastern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: You are standing on the northeastern edge of Frost Valley lake.  Before you to the south and west you can see the dark cold waters lapping gently against the shore.  You wonder what horrors lie beneath those waves.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating in the lake in the center of Frost Valley.  To the west lies the island of the Frost Elves A light mist covers the surface of the lake and to the east you can just make the shore.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating along the eastern edge of Frost Valley lake.  To the east you can just see the shore of the lake.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating along the edge of Frost Valley lake.  A slight mist covers the rolling waves of this lake.  To the south and east you can make the shore. Off to the north and west you can just make out the island of the Frost Elves.

rooms.name: Southeastern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: You are standing on the shores of the great lake in the center of this huge valley.  To the north and west lie the freezing waters of the lake.  To the south and east the valley continues.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: You are standing at the southern edge of this huge snow covered valley.  To the south tall mountains make passage impossible.  The snow covered valley surrounds you in all other directions.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: A towering mountain of ice to the north intersects a snow covered mountain to the west here creating a rough, dangerous terrain.  Rock and ice combine to form a real hazard to travel.  A fierce of gust of wind and a blinding snow storm only add to the danger.

rooms.name: Northern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: A narrow strip of snow covered terrain slips between the huge cliff face to the north and the vast Frost Valley lake to the south.  The valley continues to the east and north.  The narrow passage between the lake and the mountain heads off to the west.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating in Frost Valley lake near the northeast shore.  To the southwest you can see the huge tower that is the home of the Frost elves.  The lake continues to the south and west.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating in Frost Valley lake.  To the west rises a huge tower which is the home of the mysterious Frost Elves.  A light mist covers the surface of the lake obscuring your vision.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating near the shores of the island of the Frost Elves, which lies to the west.  All around you are the freezing waters of Frost Valley lake. A freezing wind whips across the surface of the water.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating somewhere in the lake in the middle of Frost Valley.  All around you is frigid water.  A light mist limits vision to only a few feet.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating somewhere near the southeast corner of Frost Valley lake. The cold waters surround you to the north and west.  To the south and east you can just make out the shore through the mist that covers the lake.

rooms.name: Southern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: The freezing waters of Frost Valley Lake lie to the north.  To the south a huge cliff face blocks all passage.  The valley continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: Northern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: This narrow path between the mountains to the north and the lake to the south curves slightly to match the shore of the lake.  The path continues to the east and west from here.  Off to the west you can just make out the huge plateau that dominates the northeastern section of the valley.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating near the northern shore of Frost Valley lake.  To the south you can see the huge tower that the Frost Elves call home.  The lake continues to the east and west, while to the north you can just see the shore of the lake.

rooms.name: Frost Elf Island
rooms.description: The dark waters of Frost Valley lake lap against the shores of this small island to the south and east.  To the north the huge white tower of the Frost Elves rises up before you, becoming lost in the mists that cover the lake.  To the west a huge wall with a metal gate encloses a courtyard.

West.description: A huge metal gate is set into the thick stone wall that surrounds the courtyard.  It is known that the Frost Elves only allow those pure of heart into their domain.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: Floating near the edge of Frost Elf Island you can see their large tower rising out of the mists to the north.  All around are the frigid waters of Frost Valley lake.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating along the southern shore of Frost Valley lake.  A gray mist hangs low over the surface of the lake and a chill wind sends shivers down your spine.

rooms.name: Southern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: To the north the dark cold waters of Frost Valley lake gently lap against the shore.  To the south you notice a wide, shallow opening in the mountain range that leads south.  To the east and west the shores of the lake continue.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: To the south and east tall cliffs block any passage.  To the north and west the valley continues.  A short ways up the cliff face to the south you notice a narrow opening.  Perhaps that is a cave or a tunnel of sorts.  You wonder if you can reach it...

rooms.name: Icy Tunnel Entrance
rooms.description: The hole in the mountain was in fact the entrance to a narrow tunnel covered in ice the leads roughly to the south.  The tunnel does not appear to be naturally made and you can only wonder if this is the lair of some hideous creature.

rooms.name: Icy Tunnel
rooms.description: The icy tunnel continues to the north and south.  A cold wind howls wildly through the narrow tunnel sending chills down your spine.

rooms.name: Bend in Icy Tunnel
rooms.description: The icy tunnel bends here leading both north and west.  To the west it appears to open into a large cavern.  For an instant you think you hear clicking noises.  Maybe it was just the wind whipping through the tunnel.

rooms.name: Icy Cavern
rooms.description: A vast cavern opens up before you.  Rough ledges cover the walls of this cavern at various heights.  Long sticky strands cover the floor and hang from the ceiling in places.  You wonder what could have created these strands...

rooms.name: Northern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: This narrow path continues to navigate between the mountains to the north and the lake to the south.  At times it narrows down so you are nearly walking in the waters of Frost Valley lake.  The trail continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: Before you to the south the huge tower of the Frost Elves rises before you. To the north you can just make out the shore of the lake through the mist.  To the east and west the cold waters of the lake continue.

rooms.name: Tower Courtyard
rooms.description: There is a huge courtyard here, from which the snow has been painstakingly shoveled to the walls.  To the north there is the remains of a tower.  The first floor looks reasonably complete, however above that level is just rubble. The large silver doors leading into the tower are bent and stopped, preventing access to the interior of the tower.  A large metal gate leads outside the courtyard to the east.

North.description: The doors are over ten feet tall and a dull silver color.  They are warped, as if bent and twisted by titanic forces, but which touched them long ago.  No cracks mar their rippled surfaces, but the gray sheen of corrosion covers them. They are wedged so tightly into each other and against their sturdy hinges that there appears to be no hope of opening them.

East.description: A huge metal gate is set into the wall that surrounds this courtyard. Beyond the gate are the shores of Frost Valley lake.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating in Frost valley lake somewhere near Frost Elf island.  To the north, through the mists you can just make out the wall that surrounds the tower of the Frost elves.  To the southwest you can see the shore.  A cold wind drives waves across the surface of the lake.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: To the south and west you can see the shore of Frost Valley lake.  To the north and east the cold waters of the lake recede into the mists that hang like a blanket over the lake.

rooms.name: Southern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: You are standing along the shores of the great lake at the center of Frost Valley.  To the north the cold waters look forbidding.  The shores of the lake continue to the east and northwest.  To the south and west the valley continues.  A ways to the west, high atop the ridge of the mountain you see what appears to be a small keep of sorts.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: Tall mountains rise up to block any passage to the south and west.  To the east and north the desolate valley continues.

rooms.name: Northern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: The path between the lake to the south and the mountains to the north ends at the steep cliff face of the plateau to the west.  The narrow path leads back to the east.  There appears to be a trail that winds its way up the the cliff face to the plateau overhead.  The dark waters of the lake are to the south.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating in Frost Valley lake near the northwestern shore.  To the southeast you can see the huge white tower of the Frost Elves.  The lake continues to the south and east, while to the north and west you can see the shore of this great lake.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: The vast expanse of the lake surrounds you on all sides save the east.  To the east you can see the huge white walls that surround the home of the Frost Elves.  To the northwest you can just make out the shore of the lake through the mists.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: To the east huge, white stone walls rise out of the mist enclosing the home of the Frost Elves.  In all other directions the dark waters of Frost Valley surround you.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating near the southwestern shore of Frost Valley lake.  The dark waters of the lake surround you and you can only wonder what horrors lie beneath the waves.

rooms.name: Southwestern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: You are standing on the southwestern shore of the great Frost Valley lake. Before you, to the north and east the frigid waters lap unceasingly against the shore.  To the south and west the valley continues.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: A huge mountain range to the south blocks any passage.  In all other directions the dull whiteness of Frost Valley fades into the distance.  High on a cliff to the west you can see what appears to be some kind of keep.  There appears to be movement up on the cliff.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Plateau
rooms.description: The massive mountain range that encloses Frost Valley blocks your passage to the north and east.  The edge of the plateau can be seen to the south, while to the west the plateau opens up before you.  A cold wind whips across the plateau.

rooms.name: Edge of Frost Valley Plateau
rooms.description: You are standing on the edge of the Frost Valley Plateau.  The plateau opens up before you to the north and west.  To the south and east there is nothing but air.  A narrow trail carefully navigates its way down the steep face of the plateau to the valley floor below.

rooms.name: Northwestern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: This small patch of land is sandwiched between the face of the plateau to the north and west and the dark forbidding waters of Frost Valley lake to the south and east.  Unless you have a boat or wings your only course of travel will be up the narrow trail to the top of the plateau.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: Before you to the west the steep cliffs of a plateau rise before you.  To the north you can see the shore of the lake while to the south and east the dark frigid waters of the lake continue.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Lake
rooms.description: You are floating near the western shore of Frost Valley lake.  Off to the north and east you can see the huge plateau that dominates the north western section of Frost Valley.  The lake continues to the north and east, while to the south and west you can see the shores of the lake.

rooms.name: Southwestern Edge of Lake
rooms.description: You are standing on the southwestern shore of Frost Valley lake.  To the north and east the cold waters look forbidding.  To the west and south the snow covered valley continues.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: The barren valley stretches out before you in all directions.  Off to the northeast you can see the tall tower of the frost elves rising out of the mist.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: You are the southwestern most edge of the valley.  Both to the south and west a huge mountain range blocks any passage.  To only sound you hear is the low howl of the wind whipping through the valley.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Plateau
rooms.description: To the north and east the huge mountains of ice that help enclose Frost Valley block your passage.  A strange hole seems to bore its way through the ice leading north.  All around the entrance to this strange tunnel the rock has been turned a ghastly black color!  Even the ice is black.  A wind blows across the valley and a shiver runs down your spine.  But you shiver not because of the cold, rather you shiver in horror at what could lie beyond that tunnel entrance to the north...

rooms.name: Frost Valley Plateau
rooms.description: The plateau stretches out before you in all directions.  Strangely, the ice appears black in patches.  You wonder what could have caused this strange phenomenon.  A strange pair of tracks through the snow seem to lead north, but you cannot be certain.

rooms.name: Frost Valley Plateau
rooms.description: All around you, in all directions, the great expanse of the plateau opens up before you.  The plateau is completely devoid of any vegetation.  Strange tracks can been seen in the snow leading off in various directions.

rooms.name: Edge of Frost Valley Plateau
rooms.description: You are standing near the edge of the plateau in the northeastern corner of Frost Valley.  The plateau stretches off to the north, south, and west.  A narrow path leads down the steep face of plateau to the valley floor below.

rooms.name: Edge of Frost Valley Plateau
rooms.description: You are standing near the edge of Frost Valley plateau.  The plateau continues to the north and west, while to the east and south there is nothing but air!  Looking over the edge of the plateau to the east you can see the dark waters of Frost Valley lake.  A narrow trail leads down to the valley floor below.

rooms.name: Western Edge of Lake
rooms.description: You are standing on the western edge of Frost Valley lake.  To the north a large plateau dominates the north west corner of the valley.  A path leads up to the plateau.  To the south and west the snow covered plain continues.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: The valley floor stretches out on all sides around you.  Off to the east you can just make out the tall tower on Frost Elf island.  Off to the south and west large mountains loom.

rooms.name: Frost Valley
rooms.description: Before you to the south and west a huge cliff face looms.  There appears to be a narrow path carved into the cliff high above.  To the north and east the desolate valley continues

rooms.name: Frost Valley Plateau
rooms.description: You are standing near the northwestern most section of Frost Valley.  To the north and west huge mountains rise up blocking any passage.  Off to the east the snow has been turned completely black in color.  At first it is just black splotches in the snow.  However, the further east you the travel the more black the snow appears...

rooms.name: Frost Valley Plateau
